param.name: discrete
param.label: Treat the molecular data or node summary data as discrete?
param.help: If no is selected, mol.data will be a charactor vector of molecular IDs

param.name: bin
param.label: Specify the number of levels or bins for gene.data or cpd.data when converting them to pseudo colors

param.name: both_dirs
param.label: gene.data or cpd.data is a 1 directional data when converting them to pseudo colors?

param.name: low
param.label: Specify the low color spectra to code gene.data or cpd.data
param.help: When data are 1 directional (TRUE value in both.dirs), only mid and high are used to specify the color spectra. The color values can be given as color names (red), plot color index (2=red), and HTML-style RGB, (#FF0000).

param.name: mid
param.label: Specify the mid color spectra to code gene.data or cpd.data
param.help: When data are 1 directional (TRUE value in both.dirs), only mid and high are used to specify the color spectra. The color values can be given as color names (red), plot color index (2=red), and HTML-style RGB, (#FF0000).

param.name: high
param.label: Specify the high color spectra to code gene.data or cpd.data
param.help: When data are 1 directional (TRUE value in both.dirs), only mid and high are used to specify the color spectra. The color values can be given as color names (red), plot color index (2=red), and HTML-style RGB, (#FF0000).

param.name: na_col
param.label: Color used for NA's or missing values in gene.data or cpd.data

param.name: trans_fun
param.label: How should gene.data and cpd.data be transformed?
